Uses of Interface
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.ISerializer

Packages that use ISerializer
Package
Description
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind
Support for parsing Metaschema module-based data using Java class bindings.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io
Provides core functionality for reading and writing instance data to and from bound objects.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.json
Supports reading and writing JSON instance data.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.xml
Supports reading and writing XML instance data.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.yaml
Supports reading and writing YAML instance data.
